references: Related: CF 274954, Ord 87017. Amending: Ord 90789, Ord 102366.
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to accumulated and unused sick leave benefits for certain City officers and employees, and amending Section 1.1 of Ordinance 90789 to provide that written requests for cash payment of benefits granted by Section 1 of Ordinance 90789 be made to the head of the department in which such employee is employed, and to eliminate the requirement that the Board of Administration of the City Employees' Retirement System certify the amount to be paid.
